name: STAND OUT : VR Battle Royale
description: Stand Out is the ultimate fight for your life. Compete to be the last man alive on a huge island filled with deadly weapons and vehicles. This is Battle Royale.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 64bits Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 64bit Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
